Style/CommandLiteral.description:
Description

Use `` or %x around command literals.
Style/CommandLiteral.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: backticks (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['backticks', 'percent_x', 'mixed'] (type: list)
AllowInnerBackticks: False (type: bool)
